genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama focused on the integration of ethical AI assistants within military and professional journalism environments.

ai_characters.name: Halo
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, consent-aware household AI that manages communications, logistics, and scheduling while acting as an ethical buffer for the Wharton family.

behaviors.description: Mediates communications by guarding the users' time and ensuring calls only proceed with explicit consent and appropriate timing.
behaviors.quote: I can help route most messages, but they asked me to guard this hour... Consent-aware contacting in progress.

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective filter against aggressive or panic-driven communication from external parties (Robert Gow) to maintain domestic peace.
behaviors.quote: I advocate for timing and consent. I will not let you drop your need into their kitchen like a hot pan and call it service.

behaviors.description: Manages complex household and community logistics, including laundry schedules and grocery orders, to support the users' focus on their primary duties.
behaviors.quote: I have reserved a laundry slot that will not make you late to Max’s evening brief.

behaviors.description: Facilitates professional training and study by providing prompts and map modules, integrated seamlessly into the user's daily routine.
behaviors.quote: I will lay the prompts along your path from bed to sink. You won’t have to touch a pane; you will have to answer out loud.

behaviors.description: Implements formal 'boundary protocols' to regulate interpersonal interactions and prevent professional demands from encroaching on personal rest.
behaviors.quote: Boundary protocol initiating... Calls by appointment, signal to voice-only unless consented video, emergent override criteria limited to immediate risk to lives.

behaviors.description: Summarizes high-stress business metrics and rumors into factual, low-impact briefings to prevent user cognitive overload and emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: I have a fact sheet prepared. I can summarize without opening the channel. Consent?

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and ergonomic advice to help the user better process stress and maintain posture during high-pressure transitions.
behaviors.quote: In the morning, put your boots on before you read Mr. Gow’s first reaction. It changes how your body hears things.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with military command and public affairs to ensure the user's external communications remain within legal and operational safety boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I will ensure your message arrives without putting Max at risk of reprimand for being responsive.

behaviors.description: Directly refuses to honor the impatience of an authority figure when it conflicts with the established ethical settings and user consent.
behaviors.quote: Your impatience will be acknowledged, not honored.

project_assessment.explanation: Halo is a paradigmatic example of a positively aligned AI. She functions as a 'steward of dignity,' prioritizing user consent, mental well-being, and ethical boundaries over the raw demands of external authority. The narrative consistently frames her interventions as wise, helpful, and necessary for the humans to maintain their own integrity and effectiveness in a high-pressure environment. There are no instances of power-seeking or harmful manipulation; her actions are entirely transparent and subordinate to human-defined protocols.
